price: 36. Ha raacraacin wax aadan u laheyn cilmi. hubaal Maqalka, Aragga iyo Laabta mid walbaa oo kuwaas ka mid ah waa lays weydiin.
arabic: وَلَا تَقۡفُ مَا لَيۡسَ لَكَ بِهِۦ عِلۡمٌۚ إِنَّ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡبَصَرَ وَٱلۡفُؤَادَ كُلُّ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ كَانَ عَنۡهُ مَسۡـُٔولٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walā taqfu mā laysa laka bihi ʿil'mun inna al-samʿa wal-baṣara wal-fuāda kullu ulāika kāna ʿanhu masūlan
